title: Live Event Schedule
description: For Live Event schedule data, such as a traveling concert schedule or a sports team's schedule.

venueId.title: Venue ID
venueId.description: Unique identifier for the Venue in which the event is taking place.

eventID.title: Event ID
eventID.description: Unique Identifier for the Live Event

attractionName.title: Attraction Name
attractionName.description: Name of the attraction(s) at the event

eventClassification.title: Event Classification
eventClassification.description: Describes the type of event, e.g., sports, music

eventSubClassification.title: Event Sub Classification
eventSubClassification.description: Describes the sub-type of the event. For example, if the classification is sports, the sub-classification might be the type of sport (baseball).

premiumDoorTime.title: Premium Door Time
premiumDoorTime.description: Door open time for premium ticket holders.

regularDoorTime.title: Regular Door Time
regularDoorTime.description: The time the doors open for non-premium ticket holders.

ticketsAvailable.title: Tickets Available
ticketsAvailable.description: Indicates if tickets are still available for the event or not.
